<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// AMDGPUResourceUsageAnalysis gathers resource usage on a per-function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// granularity. However, some resource info has to be assigned the call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// transitive maximum or accumulative. For example, if A calls B and B&#39;s VGPR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// usage exceeds A&#39;s, A should be assigned B&#39;s VGPR usage. Furthermore,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// functions with indirect calls should be assigned the module level maximum.</span></CodeLine>
